segments.text: It's such a shame to see the kitchen flooding like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her chore, missing the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her peaceful moment might end in a big cleanup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are trying to get cookies, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks unsteady; I worry for the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting eagerly, innocent in her anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water ruining the floor and cabinetsâ€”it's heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is beautiful, untouched by this indoor trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for the family dealing with this unnoticed chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies might not even be worth the potential fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a reminder of how quickly things can go wrong at home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor woman, she'll be upset when she finally sees it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
